attributes.action: legalise prostitution in the wake of the ipswich murders.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i ryan day propose the goverment legalise prostitution in wake of the ipswich murders.These girls that are selling there bodies for whatever need are living a dangerous life.
They should at least be offered the chance of working in a safe enviroment instead of on the streets and easy prey to the evil currently out there and also in the future.
This has worked in the usa and holland and it would work here.They still need help,support and our care so legalising prostitution would be a big step in doing that,as a citizen living in suffolk and close to ipswich im in shock and stunned at this tragedy knowing if it was legalised then these poor girls may have lived.Lets use this to stop horrors ever happening again.yours sincerely ryan day,suffolk
